title: 日本ダービーの後に・深淵に触れて

text.jpText:
サクラチヨノオーたちとの激しい競り合いの
果て、メジロアルダンは1歩及ばずに勝利を
取り逃すも、自身の未知の限界を超えかける。
text.enText:
After a fierce battle with Sakura Chiono'o 
and others, Mejiro Aldan fell one step short 
of victory. but she was about to exceed her 
own unknown limits.

text.jpText:
自分が限界を超えかけたのは、
サクラチヨノオーたちに勝ちたい想いが
極限に至ろうとしたからだと認識する一方――
text.enText:
I realized that I had almost exceeded my 
limits because my desire to win over Sakura 
Chiono'o and the other competitors had 
reached its limit. I realize that my desire 
to win over Sakura Chiono'o and the others 
was about to reach its limit.

text.jpText:
走り終えるまで、姉の威光を超えるという
目的を忘れてしまっていたことから、
彼女は新たに1つの気づきを得る。
text.enText:
from forgetting her goal of surpassing her 
sister's prestige until she finished the run. 
She comes to one new realization.

text.jpText:
その気づきとは、サクラチヨノオーたち
愛すべきライバルとの全身全霊の戦いこそ、
自分の走りを更に輝かせるというものだった。
text.enText:
What she realized was that fighting with all 
her might against her beloved rivals, such as 
Sakura Chiono O and others, was the only 
thing that would make her own running shine 
even brighter. Sakura Chiono'o and other 
beloved rivals.

text.jpText:
メジロアルダンは自分を高めてくれた
ライバルの存在に深く感謝しつつ、
新たな領域へと歩みを進めるのであった……！
text.enText:
Mejiro Aldan is deeply grateful to her rivals 
for helping her to improve herself. She is 
now moving on to new territory. ……!
